"oyata mulu jiwitha kalayak thiyenawa aadare karanna...igena ganna thiyenne punchima kalayayi...mama kiyanne adithalamak daganna udaw wena iganima gana...thamange jiwithe thamange...mata oya wenuwen thoraganim karanna ayithiyak naththe ee nisa...oyata thiranaya karanna wenawa jiwithe harima thoraganima mokakda kiyana eka...ee thiranaya uda oya ekka bandila inna ayatath ba pam enawa...ee hamadekama wagakima oyage..."
"saroj putha neda" yi amma magen asuweth "oyata ithin nanawa mathak wenneth nona gedara aawama witharayi neda" yi nangi sarojgen asuweth ekatamaya.
